subject: Re: [junit] [OT] Ward on Public Field - JUnit Recipes
msgSnippet: ... It s all personal e-mail. Let s see whether I can find it...  I don t have it any more, it doesn t seem. I think I remember reading something at
messageBody:
Shane Mingins wrote:

> Hey do you have any reference to Ward's view on public
> fields? I was trying to find one (as I thought I had
> seen more than just a reference to a conversation).

It's all personal e-mail. Let's see whether I can find it...

<pause />

I don't have it any more, it doesn't seem. I think I remember reading
something at c2.com about public fields, especially as it related to
Fit, and then I asked Ward about it, and I included his response in the
book.

> BTW, flicking through the book it looks good! Kind of
> like your mailing list postings ... only bigger ;-)

Thanks... I think. :)
--
J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com
Author, JUnit Recipes: Practical Methods for Programmer Testing
